docs.title: Welcome to GenAiDay2Operations
docs.text: This repository serves the purpose of providing an example for a full project structure with all best practices impelmented. Like CI/CD, Application Tracing, Security etc.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs/
    mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
    site/         # The directory where the site is built.
    docs/
        index.md  # The documentation homepage.
        ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: First things first
docs.text:
1. Enable gpgsign = true in either the .git/config file or globally in the .gitconfig file.

    This is needed, since this repo does not allow unsigned commits.

[commit]
    gpgSign = true
  1. Do the same for the tag signing.
[tag]
    gpgSign = true
  1. Initially apply the remote_state environment with the following command:
make apply-init
  1. Apply the rest of the environments locally with the following command:
make apply
